sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-sheet class="mx-auto" width="800">
    <v-form @submit.prevent="submit">
      <v-container >
        
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="model.lastname"
              
              bg-color="purple-lighten-5"
              variant="solo"
              :counter="10"
              :rules="rulesLastname"
              label="Votre nom"
              hide-details
              required
              @blur="v$.lastname.$touch"
              @input="v$.lastname.$touch"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
  
         
  
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
            <v-text-field
              v-model="model.email"
              prepend-inner-icon="mdi-email"
              bg-color="purple-lighten-5"
              variant="solo"
              
              :rules="rulesEmail"
              label="Votre email"
              hide-details
              required
              @blur="v$.email.$touch"
              @input="v$.email.$touch"
            ></v-text-field>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="12"
          >
            <v-textarea
              
            prepend-inner-icon="mdi-comment"
            bg-color="purple-lighten-5"
              v-model="model.comment"
              variant="solo"
              row-height="30"
              rows="4"
              :counter="10"
              :rules="rulesComment"
              label="Votre commenaire"
              hide-details
              required
              @blur="v$.comment.$touch"
              @input="v$.comment.$touch"
            ></v-textarea>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
          <v-btn 
            class="mt-2" 
            
            @click="v$.$validate"
           
            color="purple-lighten-4"
            >Submit</v-btn>
          </v-col>
          <v-col
            cols="12"
            md="6"
          >
          <v-btn 
            class="mt-2" 
            
            @click="clear"
           
            color="purple-lighten-4"
            >Clear</v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </v-sheet>
  </template>
  <script setup>

    import { ref } from 'vue';
  
    const rulesLastname = ref([]);
    const rulesEmail = ref([]);
    const rulesComment = ref([]);

  rulesLastname = [
    value => {
      if (value) 
      {
        if((value.length <= 20))
        {
          if ((value.trim())=="")
          {
            return('Le nom est obligatoire');
          }else{
            return true;
          }
          

        }else{
          return 'Le nom doit avoir moins de 20 lettres';
        }
      }else{
        return('Le nom est obligatoire')
      }
    }
  ]
  rulesEmail=[
    value=>{
      if (value) 
      {
        if (/.+@.+\..+/.test(value)) 
        {
          return true
        }else{
          return 'l\'adresse email doit Ãªtre valide.'
        }
      }else{
        return('L\'email est obligatoire');
      }
    }
  ]
  rulesComment=[
    value=>{
      if (value) 
      {
        if((value.length <= 2000))
        {
          if ((value.trim())=="")
          {
            return('Le commentaire est obligatoire');
          }else{
            return true;
          }
          

        }else{
          return 'Le commentaire doit avoir moins de 2000 lettres';
        }
      }else{
        return('Le commentaire est obligatoire')
      }
    }
  ]
  
      if 
    
  </script>
